hadiths.text: Jabir reported that Sulaik Ghatafani came on Friday (for prayer) while the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was sitting on the pulpit. Sulaik also sat down before observing prayer. The Apostle of Allah (ﷺ) said:Have you observed two rak'ahs? He said: No. He (the Holy Prophet) said: Stand and observe them

chapter.eng-name: Greeting (prayers upon entering the masjid) while the Imam is preaching
